name: agregarr
description: Agregarr is a self-hosted RSS feed aggregator built to help users follow news, blogs, and content in an organized interface. It features a clean web UI, tag-based sorting, and easy syncing. Designed for minimal setup and personal use.
features: Centralized Feeds: Aggregate all RSS feeds in one self-hosted location. One place for all your content.
Clean Reading: Distraction-free interface focused on content consumption. Read without interruptions.
Tag Organization: Quick filtering and discovery with tag-based sorting. Find content instantly.
Unified Following: Track news sources, blogs, and websites together. Everything in one dashboard.
Cross-Device Access: Automatic synchronization keeps feeds updated everywhere. Read from any device.
Simple Setup: Straightforward installation with minimal configuration required. Start reading quickly.
Personal Control: Optimized for individuals who value content ownership. Your feeds, your rules.
Fast Performance: Responsive interface that never slows down your reading. Smooth, efficient experience.
